name: Garber Buy Now Button
author: Diego Fco Tomás López.

sections.description:
This plugin shows in the catalog of the woocommerce store and on the page of each product, a button that allows your client to buy that product automatically and without having to navigate through your website, the client is redirected to the checkout of your store with only the selected product in the cart. After purchase, the content of your cart is automatically added before clicking the “Buy now” button.
If the customer does not proceed to make the purchase, the cart is filled with the previous items, adding this product automatically.
This plugin if fully free, ENJOY!
sections.faq:
The buttom is fully customizable?

Yes, the plugin allows you to change the font color, the background color of the button and more.

The buttom is compatible with product variations?

Yes, this plugin is fully compatible with simple products and variable products.

This plugin supports PHP 8?

Yes, this plugin is fully compatible with PHP 8 and older version of PHP 7.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • You can add a “Buy now” button fully customizable to your woocommerce shop.

1.1

  • Now the plugin saves and shows you the previously configured options.

1.2

  • Fixed some bugs.

1.3

  • Added loading spinner when you click on “Buy now” buttom
  • Fixed some bugs.
  • Added PHP 8 support.

short_description: This is the plugin that adds the "Buy now" button to your woocommerce store, fully customizable.
